verbs.description: [ARG0: This writer at Focus on the Family] [V: denounces] [ARG1: actors and athletes whose reputations are now in tatters] . Somehow , Donald Trump did n't make that list .
This writer at Focus on the Family denounces [ARG1: actors and athletes] [R-ARG1: whose reputations] [V: are] [ARGM-TMP: now] [ARG2: in tatters] . Somehow , Donald Trump did n't make that list .
This writer at Focus on the Family denounces actors and athletes whose reputations are now in tatters . Somehow , Donald Trump [V: did] n't make that list .
This writer at Focus on the Family denounces actors and athletes whose reputations are now in tatters . [ARGM-ADV: Somehow] , [ARG0: Donald Trump] did [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: make] [ARG1: that list] .
